item.title: By: Jessica
item.dc:creator: Jessica
item.description: Lynda Barry suggests that reading is not so much about escaping reality as it is about giving us the means to live in reality. Perhaps reading Forster and Tiptree (and others) gives us the vocabulary and ideas we need to make sense of a lot of change thrust on us in a very short time.
